plot_twist.name: Plot Twist
plot_twist.description: At the start of your agent turn, gain 1 Solari and 1 Spice.

ambush.name: Ambush
ambush.description: Reveal during combat: Add +5 Strength to your total.

diplomacy.name: Diplomacy
diplomacy.description: Allows you to place an agent on a location occupied by another player.
